summary: Not Skimpy Blades Armor for UNP body.
descriptionHtml:
[u]
[/u][b][u][size=4]I wanted not skimpy Blades Armor replacer for UNP body and without clipping. But such an armor does not exist for UNP body. And I decided to make replacer by myself.[/size][/u][/b]

[youtube]th-rdSx4bEU[/youtube]

UNP Blades Armor Replacer support weight slider from 0% to 100%. And comes with 1st person view.

[size=2][b][u]REQUIREMENTS FOR THE BASIC UNP VERSION:
[/u][/b][/size][size=2]UNP body, meshes and textures.
[/size]
[size=2][b][u]MANUAL INSTALLATION:[/u][/b]
1.Unzip/unrar downloaded archive to any location.
2.Copy folder Data into your Data folder.

[b][u]TOOLS USED:[/u][/b]
BodySlide and Outfit Studio.
NifSkope.
Skyrim Creation Engine.


[u][b]CREDITS:
[/b][/u][/size]Dimon99 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?][u][color=#0066cc]body[/color][/u][/url]. MrTroubleMaker for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30179/?][u][color=#0066cc]hands[/color][/u][/url]

[size=2][u][b]SPECIAL THANKS[/b][/u][/size] to Bethesda and nexus network especially to Caliente, (BodySlide and Outfit Studio) corwin, Alphax, m4444x, tazpn, wz, Shon, amorilia. (NifSkope)

[u][b]CONTACTS:[/b][/u]
flanua@gmail.com
author: Flanua

files.name: UNP Blades Armor Replacer
files.changelogHtml:
More then 100 vertexs in metal underwear was manually transformed and deformed and hidden in the body in Weight 0 version and Weight 1 version to fix clipping.
About 8 unwanted vertexs near the breast was manually transformed and hidden in the body. (Black lines)
